introduction: In 2003, I joined International SOS, world leader of medical and security assistance services. I relocated to Singapore in 2008, where I have spent my life since. I have held different regional leadership roles and I am a founding member of the Sustainability Committee, initially leading the S (Social) part. I was also leading the Environment pillar, with a special focus on the Ecovadis certification.

top_3_advice: Start somewhere. The first step could be identifying a cross-functional team with goodwill and the commitment to start small sustainability initiatives.
Influence senior leadership to value benefits of sustainability projects (e.g. business, HR, financials, etc..) in line with company objectives.
Do not hesitate to ask around for help and advice. There are lots of passionate people willing to support you!
how_help_users: I can help TMI users, organizations and leaders who do not know where to start their sustainability journey and want to make quick wins, especially on the environmental or social pillars where I have extensive experience. I am also happy to assist with Ecovadis certification and its link to a business. Finally, I would love to offer Ecomatcher solutions for any company wanting to start a visible Sustainability initiative for clients or employees.
consulting_focus: Quick wins on environmental or social pillars
Ecomatcher solutions for visible sustainability initiatives
ecocert_description: Ecocert is a French company, a pioneer and world leader in certification for organic agriculture, textile, forestry, cosmetics and eco-products. It was founded by a group of local farmers and agronomy engineers 32 years ago, and now has 1700 collaborators around the world. I have the pleasure of leading the team and business in the Asia-Pacific region.

ecocert_details.founded: 32 years ago by local farmers and agronomy engineers
ecocert_details.expanded_services: Sustainable and ethical certifications (fair wages, child labour, modern slavery, community impact)

ecocert_mission: Working towards a more sustainable world through stringent processes and high quality audits that guarantee and highlight best environmentally friendly and socially conscious practices
ikigai_philosophy: Japanese concept of finding balance between what you love (passion), what you are good at (profession), what you can be paid for (vocation) and what the world needs (mission). With this role at Ecocert, I strongly feel like I have found my Ikigai!

ecovadis_experience.motivation: Following GRI standards based on self-declaration, wanted audit by international organization with recognized standards
ecovadis_experience.timing: 2019 - Sustainability Committee in place, increasing pressure from business and clients
ecovadis_experience.ecovadis_scale: World's largest and most trusted provider of business sustainability ratings, over 75,000 companies
ecovadis_experience.process: Companies rated on material issues pertaining to size, location, and industry with easy-to-read scorecard

ecovadis_implementation.leadership_importance: Crucial to have full support from senior leadership - must come from the top
ecovadis_implementation.taskforce: Special Ecovadis taskforce covering all key functions
ecovadis_implementation.timeline: Less than 6 months for tremendous progress across all pillars
ecovadis_implementation.benefits: Helped focus resources on key areas, prioritize tasks, fine tune strengths

ecomatcher_ambassador.description: Digital platform helping brands fight climate change with tree planting and forest regeneration
ecomatcher_ambassador.business_model: Companies buy forest planting as gifts to employees or customers
ecomatcher_ambassador.goal: Integrate tree planting into business, think of trees as gifts/rewards instead of plastic
ecomatcher_ambassador.technology: App allows recipients to see trees grow via satellite imagery, chat with farmers, see CO2 captured

ecomatcher_philosophy: Not an 'official' offsetting program - goes beyond just offsetting. Fosters emotional attachment between recipients and trees, enables interactivity, delivers good fun. Want to change mindsets and have people view trees as a gift for any occasion.
proudest_achievement: I am most proud to be the Singapore Ambassador for Ecomatcher, a digital platform helping brands fight climate change with tree planting and forest regeneration. Selling several thousand trees with Ecomatcher has been a very exciting and fulfilling experience. And more forests to come, hopefully.
sustainability_business_perspective: I consider sustainability a strategic business agenda. Having been in the shoes of a business leader, I fully understand it is hard sometimes to know where to start with such a broad yet critical topic like sustainability.
